Bash(git -C C:/Users/kimju/Documents/couchproof commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add full sync option to fetch calories for all activities

- Renamed "Calories Burned" to "Active Calorie Burn" in weekly stats
- Added ?full=true query parameter to sync endpoint for full re-sync
- Full sync fetches last 365 days of activities with detailed data
- This ensures all activities have calories data for the Pizzas Burned stat

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C C:/Users/kimju/Documents/couchproof commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize Strava sync to avoid rate limits

- Skip API calls if activity already has calories and streams
- Default batch limit of 30 activities for full sync
- Add 200ms delay between API calls
- Return detailed sync status \(skipped, hasMore, processed count\)
- Don''t update lastStravaSync during partial batches \(allows continuation\)
- Run full sync multiple times to process all activities gradually

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
